summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4772 for the improvement of 40th Avenue Northeast, from East 55th Street to East 65th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing curbs and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 55170, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
